title: New PROJECT summoner icon boxes
body: Do the boxes refund every day and if not do you get chache fragments in hextec boxes?

replies.body: I'm not really sure I understand this issue, but I'll give it a shot!  The EM Caster, Hyper Edge, and Decrypter Icon boxes can only be redeemed once.  They will come with materials like project cores and augment cache fragments.  The only other way to obtain augment cache fragments would be through augment caches, which can be purchased through the in-game store.  We also have a [project ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)guide that can help shed some more light.  Hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jK1VEVX6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-03T21:24:52.089+0000)
>
> I'm not really sure I understand this issue, but I'll give it a shot!  The EM Caster, Hyper Edge, and Decrypter Icon boxes can only be redeemed once.  They will come with materials like project cores and augment cache fragments.  The only other way to obtain augment cache fragments would be {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} through augment caches, which can be purchased through the in-game store.  We also have a [project ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)guide that can help shed some more light.  Hope that helps clear things up!

Ok thanks
